nodes.text: Governor was a political title used by high-ranking leaders of political territories, including planets, moons and galactic regions. Sio Bibble was governor of Naboo during the last days of the Galactic Republic. In the Galactic Empire, a governor could wear a standard Imperial uniform, in the case of Arihnda Pryce, or a white outfit, as donned by Ubrik Adelhard. Imperial governors also wore rank insignia plaques consisting of six blue squares over three red and three yellow. Wilhuff Tarkin was governor of the Outer Rim Territories, however, the use of the term was merely honorific, as his rank was Grand Moff.
